page.title: 10Willingham Women's Inst.
page.content: Willingham Women's Institute celebrated its 51st. birthday on October 3rd. 1985,when Mrs.H.S.Rivers gave a talk on 'Herbs in the Garden'.She gave a demonstration of the many uses of herbs in cooking and information on the hand and face creams she produces from only pure ingredients.She was thanked by the President who also offered warm congratulations to Mrs Helen Snee who had won two Gold Stars at the Horncastle Handicraft Exhibition.Mrs.Snee had obtained a mark of 100% for a hand knitted Guernsey sweater and 95% for her caligraphy entry. The darts team had played three matches and had won them all.The competition for the best Harvest Festival basket was won by Mrs W.Hildred.
